headline: Mosaic Announces Extension of Phosphate Production Curtailments in Brazil
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / January 21, 2026 / As previously communicated on December 16th, 2025, due to the recent sharp increase in sulfur prices, Mosaic idled single super phosphate (SSP) production at its Fospar and Araxa facilities in Brazil ...
